scenario_text.value:
The space opens up over here. Get the lead
out, guys!

(Enemy corpses are scattered all over the
place Minoru led us to.)

They’re...Kenzoku? Wait, did someone take
them out for us?!

Hrmm, I don’t know this place myself. Who the
devil came here?

I wonder who beat up all the ones lying
around here?

It certainly wasn’t one of us. We’re not
strong enough to take out this many.

Wait now, Takuma. Why were enemies fighting
here in the first place?

Miyuki’s targeting us, isn’t she? Something
happened in a place even Jijimon didn’t know.

(A hidden place even Jijimon didn’t know?
A secret even he didn’t know about...)
Damn, the surviving enemies caught up to us!

I figured it was something like that.
Let’s mow them down, Takuma!
